field.label: Customer Alias Management
field.comment: You can allow the customers to manage/delete their aliases in the their account.

field.label: Await Notification
field.comment: In some cases it may take a few seconds until the transaction is successfully authorized. When this option is enabled, the notification is awaited.

field.label: Operation Mode
field.comment: If the test mode is used, then the test credentials are used. Usually, the test credentials are the same as the live credentials.

field.label: Merchant Id (Live) (USD)
field.comment: The merchant ID will be provided by Beanstream. The merchant id can be found at the top of the page in the right corner. Used for USD transactions.

field.label: Merchant Id (Live) (CAD)
field.comment: The merchant ID will be provided by Beanstream. The merchant id can be found at the top of the page in the right corner. Used for CAD transactions.

field.label: Merchant Id (Live) (GBP)
field.comment: The merchant ID will be provided by Beanstream. The merchant id can be found at the top of the page in the right corner. Used for GBP transactions.

field.label: Merchant Id (Live) (EUR)
field.comment: The merchant ID will be provided by Beanstream. The merchant id can be found at the top of the page in the right corner. Used for EUR transactions.

field.label: Hash Key (Live)
field.comment: In your Beanstream configuration navigate to administration > account settings > order settings. In "Payment Gateway -> Security/Authentication" enter this key in the field "Hash Key". Make sure the box "Include hash validation in Transaction Response Page redirection and Payment Gateway Response Notification" is checked and "SHA-1" is selected.

field.label: Api access passcode (Live)
field.comment: The api access code has to be generated in the backend of Beanstream. The api access code can be found in the back office under administration > account settings > order settings. Under "Payment Gateway" under Security/Authentication the api access code can generated and then copied into this field.

field.label: Api access passcode (Alias) of the live account.
field.comment: The api access code has to be generated in the backend of Beanstream. The api access code can be found in the back office under configuration > payment profile configuration. Under "Security Settings" the option Api access passcode has to be chosen, the code has to be generated and copied into this field.

field.label: Merchant Id (Test/Sandbox) (USD)
field.comment: The merchant ID will be provided by Beanstream. The merchant id can be found at the top of the page in the right corner. Used for USD transactions.

field.label: Merchant Id (Test/Sandbox) (CAD)
field.comment: The merchant ID will be provided by Beanstream. The merchant id can be found at the top of the page in the right corner. Used for CAD transactions.

field.label: Merchant Id (Test/Sandbox) (GBP)
field.comment: The merchant ID will be provided by Beanstream. The merchant id can be found at the top of the page in the right corner. Used for GBP transactions.

field.label: Merchant Id (Test/Sandbox) (EUR)
field.comment: The merchant ID will be provided by Beanstream. The merchant id can be found at the top of the page in the right corner. Used for EUR transactions.

field.label: Hash Key (Test/Sandbox)
field.comment: In your Beanstream configuration navigate to administration > account settings > order settings. In "Payment Gateway -> Security/Authentication" enter this key in the field "Hash Key". Make sure the box "Include hash validation in Transaction Response Page redirection and Payment Gateway Response Notification" is checked and "SHA-1" is the selected "Hash algorithm".

field.label: Api access passcode of the test/sandbox account
field.comment: The api access code has to be generated in the backend of Beanstream. The api access code can be found in the back office under administration > account settings > order settings. Under "Payment Gateway" under Security/Authentication the api access code can generated and then copied into this field.

field.label: Api access passcode (Alias) of the test/sandbox account
field.comment: The api access code has to be generated in the backend of Beanstream. The api access code can be found in the back office under configuration > payment profile configuration. Under "Security Settings" the option Api access passcode has to be chosen, the code has to be generated and copied into this field.

field.label: Order Prefix
field.comment: Here you can insert an order prefix. The prefix allows you to change the order number that is transmitted to Beanstream. The prefix must contain the tag {id}. It will then be replaced by the order number (e.g. name{id})(only alphanummeric characters).

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to Beanstream in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

field.label: Credit Card Brands
field.comment: The brand of the credit card is detected by the card number if hidden authorization is used. If the payment page is used, the user has to select the brand. The allowed credit card brands can be restricted by this setting.

field.label: Image Brand Selection
field.comment: The card brand selection is automatically done depending on the entered card number. If no Javascript is active in the browser, a drop down is shown. In case JavaScript a the brand logos can be shown. Should the brand selection using images?

field.label: Capturing
field.comment: By setting the capturing the reservation can be captured directly after the order or later manually over the backend of the store. The difference between 'order' and 'authorization' is that on 'order' only a check is done, but not really a reservation on the card.

field.label: Authorization Method
field.comment: Select the authorization method to use for processing this payment method.

field.label: Alias Manager
field.comment: The alias manager allows the customer to select from a credit card previously stored. The sensitive data is stored by Beanstream.

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to Beanstream in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.
